message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
You call that generous? I'll give you a better chance, but don't think I'm getting desperate!
Alice, let's be real. This is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
